name: Wardialer
author: I)ruid <druid@caughq.org>
description: Scan for dial-up systems that are connected to modems and answer telephony indials.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: VERBOSE
options.description: Enable detailed status messages

options.name: THREADS
options.description: The number of concurrent threads (max one per host)

options.name: ShowProgress
options.description: Display progress messages during a scan

options.name: ShowProgressPercent
options.description: The interval in percent that progress should be shown

options.name: DIALPREFIX
options.description: Dial Prefix

options.name: INITSTRING
options.description: Initialization String

options.name: SERIALPORT
options.description: Serial Port (e.g. 0 (COM1), 1 (COM2), /dev/ttyS0, etc.)

options.name: BaudRate
options.description: Baud Rate

options.name: DataBits
options.description: Data Bits (4 is Windows Only) (Accepted: 4, 5, 6, 7, 8)

options.name: ConnTimeout
options.description: Timeout per data connection in seconds

options.name: DialDelay
options.description: Time to wait between dials in seconds (rec. min. 1)

options.name: DialSuffix
options.description: Dial Suffix

options.name: DialTimeout
options.description: Timeout per dialed number in seconds

options.name: DisplayModem
options.description: Displays modem commands and responses on the console

options.name: FlowControl
options.description: Flow Control (Accepted: None, Hardware, Software, Both)

options.name: InitInterval
options.description: Number of dials before reinitializing modem

options.name: LogMethod
options.description: Log Method (Accepted: File)

options.name: NudgeString
options.description: Nudge String

options.name: Parity
options.description: Parity (Mark & Space are Windows Only) (Accepted: None, Even, Odd, Mark, Space)

options.name: RedialBusy
options.description: Redials numbers found to be busy

options.name: StopBits
options.description: Stop Bits (Accepted: 1, 2)
